home.description: Welcome to SpeechConvert - where you can switch between text and speech in just a few simple steps. With our application, you can quickly and conveniently convert text into speech and vice versa.

feature1.title: Convert Text to Speech
feature1.description: Enter the text you want to convert and choose the voice you want to use, then press the "Convert" button - and immediately, you will have an audio file with the automatically generated voice.

feature2.title: Convert Speech to Text
feature2.description: Record or upload an audio file and select your language, then press the "Convert" button - and you will receive accurate text from the speech.

feature3.title: Multilingual and Multiple Voices
feature3.description: Supports multiple languages and voices, allowing you to customize the conversion experience to your preference.

feature4.title: Simple and Easy
feature4.description: SpeechConvert is designed to make the process of converting between text and speech as simple and easy as possible. With a user-friendly interface and customizable features, you can create high-quality audio and text files in just a few simple steps.

feature5.title: Free and No Registration Required
feature5.description: SpeechConvert is a free service and does not require registration. You can use our features without creating an account, saving you time and providing the most convenient user experience for everyone.

home.getStarted: Experience the power of converting between text and speech quickly and easily with SpeechConvert. Try it today!

question1.question: What is Text to Speech?
question1.answer: Text to Speech (TTS) is a technology that converts text into speech, allowing users to listen to the content instead of reading it.

question2.question: How do I use the text-to-speech feature?
question2.answer: You simply enter or paste the text into the input field and press the 'Convert' button to hear the text read aloud.

question3.question: Can dialogue be converted to speech?
question3.answer: Yes, you can enter the dialogue into the input field, and the system will convert it into corresponding speech.

question4.question: Does this feature support multiple languages?
question4.answer: Currently, we support multiple languages, including English, Vietnamese, and many others.

question5.question: Is there a fee to use this service?
question5.answer: We offer some features for free. However, to access advanced features, you may need to subscribe to our service plans.

question6.question: How can I contact customer support?
question6.answer: You can contact us via email at {email}.
